channel.title: REST on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in REST on Life Reboot

item.title: Google App Engine, Go and Go-RESTful
item.description: I’ve spent the better part of a week now learning about a new suite of technologies which I am interested in using to develop my TMO gaming framework.

item.title: The REST API Design Handbook
item.description: There’s a lot of confusion and disagreement about what makes for a RESTful design.
